import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' import './customer-profile.css' import companyImage from './Generic Person.png' export default function CustomerProfile() { //TODO if password is empty, keep the password from props const initialPassword = '' const handleSubmit = (values, { setFieldValue }) => { //TODO finish this let sentPassword = values.password if (sentPassword === '') { //don't send "values.password", send "sentPassword" sentPassword = initialPassword; } alert(JSON.stringify(values)) setFieldValue('password', '') } return (
handleSubmit(values, { setFieldValue })} > {({ values, dirty }) => (<>
First & Last name
Email
Password
)}
) }
